summary: Alistare is an assassin from the Dark Brotherhood who spends his spare time in taverns working as a mercenary.
descriptionHtml:
Alistare is an assassin from the Dark Brotherhood who spends his spare time in taverns working as a mercenary.  He can be found in the Silver Blood inn in Markarth.  
Requires ApachiiSkyHair in order to work properly.
author: MysteriousKnight244
